Source code for profiles.models

 1from django.db import models
 2from django.contrib.auth.models import User
 3
 4


[docs]
 5class Profile(models.Model):
 6    user = models.OneToOneField(User, on_delete=models.CASCADE)
 7    favorite_city = models.CharField(max_length=64, blank=True)
 8
 9    def __str__(self):
10        return self.user.username
